en.validateXmlTooltip: Use XML validator to validate the XML
en.tipsToResolveError: Tips to fix this error (try one of the followings)
en.unexpectedQuoted: needs to be inside of a modification element
en.addActiveModification: Add a modification around the element
en.unmarkQuoted: Unmark the '{name}' if it is not quoting a part of an document but is a simple quote
en.elementOnly: can not directly contain plain text
en.elementNotMarked: is not fully or partially marked
en.markInsideElement: mark missing elements inside this element
en.removeText: delete the plain text from this element

it.validateXmlTooltip: Usa il validatore XML per validare il documento
it.validationProcessError: E' stato impossibile eseguire la validazione a causa dell'errore
